scripts.prod: LIBNAME=lui-big DIM=45 NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./scripts/lib.config.js --progress --mode development && LIBNAME=lui-mid DIM=30 NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./scripts/lib.config.js --progress --mode development && NODE_ENV=production DIM=30 webpack --config ./scripts/demo.config.js --progress --mode production
scripts.lib: coffee -cmw --output ./dist/ ./components & LIBNAME=lui-mid DIM=30 NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./scripts/lib.config.js --watch --progress --mode development
